message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the details with you. We're willing to offer you the product at a price of $950000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and we're confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this price is more in line with the product's value to me.
